name: Jet Funk Super
description:
A funky roller exhibition of epic proportions! Grind, ride, and slide your way to the top of the online scoreboard and attempt to collect as many cassettes as possible!

Controls:

WASD/Left Stick: Move

Shift/Trigger: Dash

Space/A: Jump

HINTS: 

  • When ramping, it is not necessary to jump
  • Press Jump while wall riding to boost off of the wall
  • Golden cassettes are worth more points

Programmer/Generalist: Kaleb Knoettgen

Art/Modelling/Animation support: Tyler Knoettgen, Richard Roberts-Decos
